text: Steven Jay Blum who is known professionally by his credited stage name as Steve Blum (born April 29, 1960) is an American voice actor who is well known for his distinctive deep voice of both Wolverine from various Marvel projects and Sub-Zero from the Mortal Kombat franchise. == Filmography == === Video games === * Ratchet & Clank: Going Commando (2003) * X-Men Legends (2004) * Sly 2: Band of Thieves (2004) * God of War (2005) * X-Men Legends II: Rise of Apocalypse (2005) * Marvel: Ultimate Alliance (2006) * Halo 3 (2007) * Batman: Arkham Asylum (2009) * Batman: Arkham City (2011) * Sly Cooper: Thieves in Time (2013) * God of War: Ascension (2013) * Batman: Arkham Origins (2013) * Mortal Kombat X (2015) * Batman: Arkham Knight (2015) * Injustice 2 (2017) * Mortal Kombat 11 (2019) * Marvel Ultimate Alliance 3: The Black Order (2019) == Other websites == * Category:1960 births Category:American video game actors Category:American voice actors Category:Jewish American actors Category:Actors from Santa Monica, California Category:Living people
title: Steve Blum
